roadmapItems.title: Release 1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with key features and bug fixes.

children.title: OAuth2 Integration
children.description: Integrating OAuth2 for enhanced authentication.

children.title: Resolved token expiration issues.
children.description: Fixed issues causing premature token expiration.

children.title: Fixed client credential grant flow bugs.
children.description: Resolved bugs affecting the client credential grant flow.

children.title: Added support for custom scopes.
children.description: Introduced support for defining custom OAuth2 scopes.

children.title: Improved OAuth2 token introspection endpoint.
children.description: Enhanced the token introspection endpoint for better functionality.

children.title: JWT Enhancements
children.description: Improving JWT support and handling.

children.title: Corrected JWT signature verification errors.
children.description: Fixed errors in verifying JWT signatures.

children.title: Introduced support for custom JWT claims.
children.description: Added the ability to define custom claims in JWTs.

children.title: Improved JWT expiration handling.
children.description: Enhanced the handling of JWT expiration for better security.

roadmapItems.title: Release 1.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Introducing multi-factor authentication and improved user role management.

children.title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
children.description: Enhancing security with multi-factor authentication options.

children.title: Fixed bugs in MFA setup flow.
children.description: Resolved issues encountered during MFA setup.

children.title: Resolved issues with SMS-based MFA.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting SMS-based multi-factor authentication.

children.title: Added support for TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password).
children.description: Introduced support for TOTP in MFA.

children.title: Introduced push notification-based MFA.
children.description: Added push notification support for multi-factor authentication.

children.title: User Role Management
children.description: Improving the management of user roles and permissions.

children.title: Corrected issues with role assignment.
children.description: Fixed bugs in assigning roles to users.

children.title: Fixed bugs in role-based access control (RBAC) logic.
children.description: Resolved issues in the RBAC logic.

children.title: Added granular role permissions.
children.description: Introduced more detailed permissions for user roles.

children.title: Implemented role hierarchy for nested permissions.
children.description: Added support for hierarchical roles and nested permissions.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update focusing on enhanced security protocols and API rate limiting.

children.title: Enhanced Security Protocols
children.description: Implementing new security protocols for better protection.

children.title: Resolved vulnerabilities in token storage.
children.description: Fixed security vulnerabilities in the storage of tokens.

children.title: Fixed issues with secure cookie handling.
children.description: Resolved problems with handling secure cookies.

children.title: Implemented HSTS (HTTP Strict Transport Security).
children.description: Added HSTS to enhance HTTP security.

children.title: Added support for Content Security Policy (CSP).
children.description: Introduced CSP to prevent cross-site scripting and other attacks.

children.title: API Rate Limiting
children.description: Enhancing API security with rate limiting features.

children.title: Corrected rate limiting algorithm errors.
children.description: Fixed errors in the rate limiting algorithms.

children.title: Introduced IP-based rate limiting.
children.description: Added support for rate limiting based on IP addresses.

children.title: Added customizable rate limiting policies.
children.description: Implemented policies allowing customization of rate limiting rules.

children.title: Audit Logging
children.description: Introducing detailed audit logging for authentication events.

children.title: Fixed bugs in log generation.
children.description: Resolved issues with generating accurate audit logs.

children.title: Implemented detailed audit logs for authentication events.
children.description: Introduced comprehensive logging of authentication-related events.

children.title: Added support for log export in various formats.
children.description: Provided options to export logs in multiple formats for better analysis.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Release enhancing OAuth2, JWT features, and MFA improvements.

children.title: OAuth2 Enhancements
children.description: Improving OAuth2 functionality with new features and fixes.

children.title: Resolved issues with token refresh flow.
children.description: Fixed bugs affecting the OAuth2 token refresh flow.

children.title: Added support for PKCE (Proof Key for Code Exchange).
children.description: Introduced PKCE support for enhanced OAuth2 security.

children.title: Improved error handling and reporting in OAuth2 flows.
children.description: Enhanced the error handling and reporting mechanisms in OAuth2.

children.title: Advanced JWT Features
children.description: Adding advanced features to JWT handling and support.

children.title: Fixed bugs in JWT blacklisting.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the blacklisting of JWTs.

children.title: Added support for JWT revocation.
children.description: Introduced the ability to revoke JWTs for better security.

children.title: Implemented advanced JWT audience restrictions.
children.description: Added advanced audience restrictions to improve JWT security.

children.title: MFA Improvements
children.description: Enhancing multi-factor authentication with new options and fixes.

children.title: Corrected issues with backup MFA methods.
children.description: Fixed bugs affecting backup methods for MFA.

children.title: Added biometric authentication support.
children.description: Introduced support for biometric methods in MFA.

children.title: Improved user interface for MFA setup.
children.description: Enhanced the user interface for setting up multi-factor authentication.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major release introducing federated identity support and user session management.

children.title: Federated Identity Support
children.description: Supporting federated identities with new authentication protocols.

children.title: Fixed bugs in identity provider integration.
children.description: Resolved issues with integrating various identity providers.

children.title: Added support for SAML-based authentication.
children.description: Introduced support for authentication using SAML.

children.title: Implemented support for OpenID Connect.
children.description: Added support for authentication using OpenID Connect.

children.title: User Session Management
children.description: Improving management of user sessions for better control and security.

children.title: Resolved issues with session persistence.
children.description: Fixed bugs affecting the persistence of user sessions.

children.title: Introduced session timeout and expiration policies.
children.description: Added policies for session timeouts and expiration to enhance security.

children.title: Added real-time session monitoring and termination.
children.description: Introduced real-time monitoring and the ability to terminate sessions.

children.title: Enhanced MFA Options
children.description: Adding new options and improving the functionality of multi-factor authentication.

children.title: Corrected issues with MFA recovery.
children.description: Fixed bugs affecting the recovery process for MFA.

children.title: Added support for hardware security keys (FIDO2).
children.description: Introduced support for hardware security keys using FIDO2.

children.title: Improved MFA fallback options and user experience.
children.description: Enhanced the fallback options and overall user experience for MFA.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Focus on API performance optimization and customizable authorization policies.

children.title: API Performance Optimization
children.description: Optimizing API performance for better efficiency and speed.

children.title: Fixed latency issues in authentication endpoints.
children.description: Resolved latency issues affecting the authentication endpoints.

children.title: Resolved performance bottlenecks in token generation.
children.description: Fixed performance bottlenecks occurring during token generation.

children.title: Implemented caching mechanisms for frequent requests.
children.description: Introduced caching to improve response times for frequent API requests.

children.title: Improved database query efficiency for user data.
children.description: Optimized database queries to enhance the efficiency of accessing user data.

children.title: Customizable Authorization Policies
children.description: Enhancing authorization with customizable policies.

children.title: Corrected errors in policy enforcement.
children.description: Fixed issues in enforcing authorization policies correctly.

children.title: Introduced attribute-based access control (ABAC).
children.description: Added support for ABAC to allow more granular access control.

children.title: Added support for dynamic policy updates.
children.description: Introduced the ability to update authorization policies dynamically.
